players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is. I believe Alice is the mafioso based on my investigation."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate me or Bob first? Your claim seems suspicious."
You: "Diana makes a good point. Charlie, why investigate me first instead of someone more suspicious? This feels like a rushed claim."
You: "Charlie, if you're truly the detective, why did you wait until after Bob was killed to reveal? You could have saved him by speaking up earlier. This timing makes your claim questionable."

Charlie: "I understand your concerns, Diana and Alice. As the detective, my priority was to gather enough evidence before making an accusation. I believe Alice is the mafioso based on my investigation, but I wanted to ensure I had solid proof. I apologize if it seemed like..."

Diana: "Charlie, your explanation doesn't add up. If you investigated Alice last night, why wait until after Bob was killed to reveal? This timing suggests you're mafia trying to frame Alice after the kill."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
